About Cats on Code

Jamie

The human behind the code.

A farm raised, free-range designer & developer. Currently living in Seattle, WA where I work as software engineer at Avvo. I climb mountains and guzzle growlers when I'm not in front of a screen and will post whatever I feel like to this blog. Cheers!

I also have this half-assed site: illbringthedonuts.com



Octo & Amper

The Cats Behind the Code

Octo (Octothorpe, black) & Amper (Ampersand, tabby) were adopted from PAWS chicago a month after I finished Dev Bootcamp. While they won't be making that many apperances on the blog, rest assured they kept my lap during the whole post making process.




The Blog

This blog is built using Jekyll and hosted on Github pages.
